title: Single-Serve Chocolate Chip Pizookie
directions: In a small bowl or ramekin (or 4-6 inch oven-safe skillet), mix softened butter, sugars, vanilla, salt, and egg yolk (or milk).
Stir in the flour until just combined.
Press the dough into a small greased oven-safe dish or mini skillet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden around the edges but still soft in the center.
Let cool for 2-3 minutes, then top with coffee ice cream.
notes: Can substitute egg yolk with 1 tbsp milk if you don't want to crack an egg. Optional add-ins: nuts, espresso powder. Coffee ice cream pairs especially well with the warm cookie.
